DOC.brief_summary: 20 chronic pain patients using codeine are compared with 20 chronic patients not using opioids and 20 healthy volunteers with respect to driving ability measured by neurophysiological tests and driving in a car simulator.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Codeine on Driving Abilities
DOC.criteria: patients with chronic pain driving more than 50 000 km addiction eyesight disorders
DOC.keyword: possible problems using codeine when driving
